|| RULES ||
1. Don't be a bigot.
2. Dont' post Bad.
3. Respect the Mods.
4. Be nice to new players.
5. Do not grief/rdm/etc.
|| RP INFO || This is classified as a Medium RP server. What that basically means is that unlike Heavy RP sillyness is allowed and actively encouraged. But it must be within the confines of a character who has an in-character reason for being silly. Basically, have an in-character reason for doing things and such. Be creative!
